definition: light water (as opposed to heavy water)/see light water reactor 輕水反應堆|轻水反应堆
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: North Korea has been building a light-water reactor at its main Yongbyon nuclear complex since last year.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮自去年起就在寧邊核設施建造一座輕水反應堆。

sentences.english: The working curves of heavy water and light water are comparable.
sentences.chinese: 比較了重水和輕水的工作曲線。
